title: Contact Us - Sure Lock & Key Utah
description: Get in touch with Sure Lock & Key Utah. Available 7 days a week for all your locksmith needs.

data.title: Tell Us What's Going On
data.description: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

questions.question: How quickly can you respond to an emergency?
questions.answer: We typically arrive within 20-30 minutes for emergency calls in the Salt Lake area.

questions.question: Do you service all of Salt Lake County?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide locksmith services throughout Salt Lake County and surrounding areas.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash, all major credit cards, and digital payments.

questions.question: Are you licensed and insured?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed, bonded, and insured for your protection.

questions.question: Do you offer free estimates?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide free estimates for all non-emergency services.

questions.question: Can you make keys for all car makes and models?
questions.answer: Yes, we service all major car brands and can program transponder keys and key fobs.
